title: Skandi Villa Large 2Bed/2Bath Edmonds! Reserved Parking Included
posting_body: Skandi Villa Apartments is located in the desirable city of Edmonds, Washington.
2 BR 2 BATH.
Was previously upgraded in 2019 with newer cabinets counter tops, light fixtures, tile bathroom floors and shower and more.
In 2022 we added brand new LVT throughout the unit!
Each apartment home comes with one reserve parking space per apartment and a storage closet on the deck.
Each unit is equipped with an oven, range, dishwasher, disposal, refrigerator, ceiling fans and private patios or balconies.
Laundry on-site with payments via debit or coins.
Open guest parking available at the front.
$850 security deposit
$75 monthly water, garbage, sewer / flat rate per household
$45 application fee per applicant
No pets
No smoking
12 month lease
Renters Insurance Required
Screening Criteria: Monthly income 3 x rental amount.
650 credit score & clean rental history.
Applications available online and accepted on a first come, first serve basis.
Applicants are screened for a credit score of 650 or higher, with minimal negative reporting, positive rental history, and a collective income of 3 times the monthly rent.
Consider this statement as notification that we do not accept a comprehensive reusable tenant screening report, as defined by RCW 59.18.257.
Professionally managed by Phillips Real Estate LLC.
For best method of contact, please contact Preston Ingersoll with Phillips Real Estate, LLC.
QR code in photos which is direct link to agents email.
